mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_CODE "boardCode", BOARD_NAME "boardName" FROM BOARD_TYPE ORDER BY BOARD_CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_LOCK, B.MEMBER_NO, (SELECT I.IMG_PATH || I.IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND I.IMG_ORDER = 0) AS THUMBNAIL_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B
JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND (BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_LOCK, B.MEMBER_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
VOLUNTEER_START, VOLUNTEER_END, VOLUNTEER_CATEGORY, VOLUNTEER_AGENCY, VOLUNTEER_TYPE,
(SELECT I.IMG_PATH || I.IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO ORDER BY I.IMG_ORDER FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) AS THUMBNAIL_PATH,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND (BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_NO < #{boardNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_NO > #{boardNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "BOARD_LIKE" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
DELETE FROM SCRAP WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_REPORT (REPORT_NO, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_NO, REPORT_REASON, REPORT_REASON_DETAIL, REPORT_DATE, PROCESS_YN) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_REPORT.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{boardNo}, #{reportReason}, #{reportReasonDetail}, SYSDATE, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "BOARD_REPORT" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE "BOARD" SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND BOARD_PW = #{boardPw} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT SUBSTR(PROFILE_IMG, INSTR(PROFILE_IMG, '/', -1) + 1) "rename" FROM "MEMBER" UNION SELECT CAST(IMG_RENAME AS VARCHAR2(300)) "rename" FROM "BOARD_IMG"
